attributes.action: Don't introduce linear A-Level exams and don't scrap January exams!
attributes.additional_details: We think that the current government are completely deluded in deciding to scrap January exams and potentially all AS exams and create a linear exam system. We are trying to get as many signatures as we can to initiate the re-introduction of January exams to A-Levels ASAP! Please share with friends and let's try to get some results here!
